title: Bagels and Beans
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Fast food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lunchroom with locations throughout Netherlands. Menu is inspired not by American-style bagles but the tastes and herbs of Southern France. Offers a choice of vegetarian and vegan bagles, sweets, coffees and fresh juices, made largely with fair-trade and organic ingredients. Could replace cream cheese with hummus for most menu items.
